string-array.name: Description
string-array.item: A delish of meat wrapped around cheese (or with cheese filling), then breaded and pan-fried or deep-fried.
Made from the famous japanese Wagyu beef, this steak produces a one of a kind umami flavor when cooked correctly.
The classic british dish involving fish deep fried in crispy batter, accompanied with fried wedge potatos.
A cute-looking soup made from various vegetables wrapped with thick and creamy soup, covered in baked puff pastry.
The best chicken dish originated in Japan, deep fried chicken covered with iconic soy sauce.
Scallop cooked in sweet and sour oyster sauce that will melt your mouth.
